SEARCH
Package org.fluentjdbc

Class DatabaseResult

java.lang.Object
org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseResult
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault public class DatabaseResult extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Collects together a PreparedStatement and the resulting ResultSet, as well as metaData to map column names to collect indexes from ResultSetMetaData. Use list(RowMapper), forEach(RowConsumer) and single(org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseResult.RowMapper<T>, java.util.function.Supplier<java.lang.RuntimeException>, java.util.function.Supplier<org.fluentjdbc.MultipleRowsReturnedException>) to process the ResultSet

    static interface 
    DatabaseResult.RowMapper<T>
    Functional interface for single(RowMapper, Supplier, Supplier) and list(RowMapper).

    • list

      @CheckReturnValue public <T> List<T> list(DatabaseResult.RowMapper<T> mapper) throws SQLException
      Call mapper for each row in the ResultSet and return the result as a List. If DatabaseResult.RowMapper throws SQLException, processing is aborted and the exception is rethrown
      Parameters:
      mapper - Function to be called for each row
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • stream

      @CheckReturnValue public <T> Stream<T> stream(DatabaseResult.RowMapper<T> mapper, String query) throws SQLException
      Returns a Stream which iterates over all rows in the ResultSet and apply a DatabaseResult.RowMapper to each.
      Parameters:
      mapper - Function to be called for each row
      query - The SQL that was used to generate this DatabaseResult. Used for logging
      Throws:
      SQLException
      See Also:
      • DatabaseTableQueryBuilder.stream(Connection, RowMapper)

    • iterator

      @CheckReturnValue public <T> org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseResult.Iterator<T> iterator(DatabaseResult.RowMapper<T> mapper, String query) throws SQLException
      Returns an DatabaseResult.Iterator which iterates over all rows in the ResultSet and apply a DatabaseResult.RowMapper to each.

    • forEach

      public void forEach(DatabaseResult.RowConsumer consumer) throws SQLException
      Call DatabaseResult.RowConsumer for each row in the ResultSet. If DatabaseResult.RowMapper throws SQLException, processing is aborted and the exception is rethrown
      Throws:
      SQLException
